attributes.additional_details: Political manifestos are a cornerstone of electoral campaigns, serving as a contract between political parties and the voters. However, the absence of legal mechanisms to enforce these commitments has led to a growing disconnect between electoral promises and governmental actions. Such discrepancies undermine public confidence in democratic institutions and erode the integrity of the electoral process.
attributes.background: This proposed law aims to enhance accountability, transparency, and trust in the democratic process by ensuring that the promises made to the electorate are honoured and implemented.
